text: Katherine Isobel Murray (also Katharine Isabelle; born November 2, 1981) is a Canadian actress. She played Chloe in the movie Cousins (1989). She also played Lindsay Clark in the movie Disturbing Behavior (1998). She played Julia Baker in the movie "Countdown" (2016). Isabelle was born in Vancouver, British Columbia. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian child actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors
title: Katharine Isabelle
